Ranbir-Alia Pose For Media As They Leave For Kumbh To Unveil The First Look Of Brahmastra!
Ranbir-Alia Pose For Media As They Leave For Kumbh To Unveil The First Look Of Brahmastra!
On the auspicious occasion of Shivratri, Alia Bhatt and Amitabh Bachchan have taken off to Kumbh 2019 for a very special reason.
Everything hints that the couple is all set to unveil the first look at their upcoming fantasy film, Brahmastra, that stars them in lead roles.
“Kya aap sab tayyaar hai? (Are you all ready?) See you all at 7:30 PM!,” wrote Alia Bhatt on social media.
Big B too was on the same page as he wrote,
“#Kumbh2019 mein ek adbhut kahaani ki shuruaat hogi! (An interesting new story will begin at Kumbh 2019). Stay tuned for more updates.”
After seeing all the sad-sullen photos of Alia, seeing her happy and smiling around Ranbir was a change that all of us liked.

Before taking off for the promotional stint, Ranbir, Alia and director Ayan Mukerji were spotted at the Mumbai airport private terminal. Take a look.
